entity.name: product
entity.query: SELECT p.id,p.name_en,p.name_ru,p.name_cn,p.country_id, pm.id as pm_id,pm.name_en AS pm_name_en,pm.name_ru AS pm_name_ru,pm.name_cn AS pm_name_cn, p.price,p.net,p.gross,p.volume,p.payment_option_id,p.moderate_status,p.article_code,p.hash,p.showcase_id FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_manufacturers pm ON pm.id = p.product_manufacturer_id WHERE p.moderate_status = 4

entity.name: showcase
entity.query: SELECT s.id,s.category_id,s.supplier_id,s.manufacturer_id,s.company_id,s.deleted, sup.rating AS supplier_rating, man.rating AS manufacturer_rating FROM showcase s LEFT JOIN suppliers sup ON sup.id = s.supplier_id LEFT JOIN manufacturers man ON man.id = s.manufacturer_id WHERE s.id = ${product.showcase_id}

entity.name: showcase_override_properties
entity.query: SELECT sp.unit_id AS price_per_unit, sp1.unit_id AS currency_per_unit FROM showcase_override_properties sp LEFT JOIN showcase_override_properties sp1 ON sp.showcase_id = sp1.showcase_id AND sp1.override_property_id = 3 WHERE sp.showcase_id = ${showcase.id} AND sp.override_property_id = 2
